resources.string: Created with care by Nithish Gajula

Thank you for choosing EasyMarkdown!
 This application is a personal project and maintain in my free time, and every bit of your support is genuinely appreciated. Whether it’s help with design, icon creation, adding translations for different languages, or simply leaving a tip, any form of support makes a difference.

 If you encounter any issues with application, please feel free to reach out. And consider rating the app on the Play Store.

 Please note: Internet access permission is requested solely to retrieve embedded images from online sources only within your markdown.

Thank you for choosing EasyMarkdown! This application is a personal project and maintain in my free time, and every bit of your support is genuinely appreciated. Whether it’s help with design, icon creation, adding translations for different languages, or simply leaving a tip, any form of support makes a difference.

 If you encounter any issues with application, please feel free to reach out. And consider rating the app on the Play Store.

 Please note: In-app purchases for tips are a way to support development and do not unlock any additional features And Internet access permission is requested solely to retrieve embedded images from online sources only within your markdown.
Visit our developer site for more info
